src:
Bomba iz Amerike: Ibrahimović potpisao za Milan!
Kaže prvi čovek MLS lige

07 Nov 2019

Zlatan Ibrahimović ima 38 godina i još je zvezda prelaznih rokova!
Iako zimska fudbalska pijaca još nije ni počela, izgleda da je Ibrakadabra prva zvezda januarskog prelaznog roka.
Ako je verovati informacijama koji večeras stižu iz Amerike, Zlatan Ibrahimović je potpisao za Milan!
To kaže prvi čovek američke MLS lige Don Garber. On je slučajno ili namerno u jednom intervju danas otkrio da je Ibra već potpisao za Rosonere čiji dres je sa uspehom nosio dve sezone od 2010. do 2012. godine.„Zlatan je interesantan karakter koji uvek drži pažnju. Potrebni su nam u MLS ligi takvi likovi. Kao što je nekada bio Bekam. Iako Ibrahimović ima 38 godina, sada je opet potpisao za Milan, koji je jedan od najvećih klubova na svetu. Kod nas je za dve godine oborio skoro sve rekorde sa tolikim brojem golova koje je postigao. Nadam se da će se vratiti jednog dana, ali sve zavisi od Los Anđeles Galaksija. Srećan sam što je bio kod nas, sviđali su mi se njegovi nastupi. Pogotovo kada je o sebi pričao u trećem licu“, rekao je Garber.
Iz Italije još nema nikakvih potvrda, ali izjave prvog čoveka MLS liga treba shvatiti ozbiljno.
Ibrahimović je i prošle zime bio želja Milanovog tadašnjeg direktora Leonarda koji je želeo da ga vrati. Međutim, sa Ibrinim dolaskom se tada nije složio generalni direktor Ivan Gazidis koji je protivnik dovođenje iskusnih igrača sa visokim platama.
Ove jeseni je Ibri istekao ugovor sa Los Anđeles Galaksijem, šuškalo se da će Milan opet pokušati da ga vrati. Sportski direktor Paolo Maldini izjavio da bi povratak Ibrahimovića bio potez iz snova za Milan, ali da ne veruje da bi Ibra prihvatio da povremeno sedi na klupi. Uz prisustvo Gazidisa u klubu, delovalo je da od te priče nema ništa, ali katastrofalni rezultati Milana ove sezone su izgleda naterali rukovodstvo da u Ibrahimovićevom dovođenju pokuša da nađe spasioca.
Milan ima najmalđi tim u Seriji A i to neiskustvo ga je do sada skupo koštalo. Napadači poput Pjonteka, Leaoa i Rebića do sada nisu zadovoljili i igrač Ibrahimovićevog kalibra bi bio od velike koristi. Pogotovo što je Ibra najbolje godine karijere proveo u Seriji A i najviše mu je odgovarala za stil igre. Branio je boje Juventusa, Intera i Milana a nikada nije krio da mu je najlepše bilo među Rosonerima i da želi da se vrati jednog dana i da sa porodicom živi opet u Milanu. Nije krio ni da je nevoljno napustio klub 20102. godine kada je u paketu sa Tijagom Silvom prodat Pari Sen Žermenu jer su Milanu bile potrebne pare i da ih je Galijani tada praktično naterao na transfer.
Za dve sezone u Milanu, Ibrahimović je postigao 56 golova na 85 utakmica i bio najzaslužniji za poslednuju titulu Rosonera u Seriji A 2011. godine. Od tada traje nezadrživ pad slavnog kluba sa San Sira...
Kao zainteresovani klubovi za Ibrahimovića ove jeseni su se pominjali Bolonja, Napoli, Boka Juniors, Flamengo... Ali izgleda da je Milan bio najprimaljivija opcija za slavnog Šveđanina.
Ako je verovati vestima iz Amerike. Inače, Gazidis koji se do sada protivio dovođenju Ibrahimovića je 14 godina radio u MLS ligi, poznaje se dobro sa Garberom, pa otuda možda treba i tražiti izvor informacije koju je večeras lansirao prvi čovek MLS lige.
(FOTO: reuters)
text:
Bomb from America: Ibrahimovic signs for Milan!
Says the first man of the MLS League

07 Nov 2019

Zlatan Ibrahimovic is 38 years old and still a star of the deadlines!
Although the winter football market has not even begun yet, Ibrakadabra appears to be the first star of the January deadline.
If you believe the information coming tonight from America, Zlatan Ibrahimovic has signed for Milan!
That's what the first man in the American MLS League, Don Garber, says. He inadvertently or intentionally revealed in an interview today that Ibra has already signed for the Rosoners, whose jersey he successfully wore for two seasons from 2010 to 2012. “Gold is an interesting character that always holds his attention. We need such characters in the MLS League. As Beckham used to be. Although Ibrahimovic is 38, he has now re-signed for Milan, which is one of the biggest clubs in the world. With us in two years, he broke almost all the records with so many goals he scored. I hope he comes back one day, but it all depends on the Los Angeles Galaxy. I'm happy he was with us, I liked his performances. Especially when he talked about himself in the third person, "Garber said.
There are no confirmations from Italy yet, but first-person statements from MLS leagues need to be taken seriously.
Ibrahimovic was also the desire of Milan's then-director Leonard last winter, who wanted him back. However, Ibar's arrival at the time did not agree with General Manager Ivan Gazidis, who is opposed to bringing experienced players with high salaries.
This fall, Ibri's contract with the Los Angeles Galaxy expired, it was rumored that Milan would try to get him back. Sporting director Paolo Maldini says Ibrahimovic's return would be a dream move for Milan, but he does not believe Ibra would accept sitting on the bench from time to time. With Gazidis present at the club, it seemed like nothing was going on from that story, but Milan's disastrous results this season seem to have forced management to try and find a savior in Ibrahimovic's arrival.
Milan have the smallest team in Serie A and that inexperience has cost him so far. Forwards like Pjontek, Leao and Rebic have not been satisfied so far and a player of Ibrahimovic's caliber would be of great use. Especially since Ibra spent the best years of his career in Serie A and was best suited to his style of play. He defended the colors of Juventus, Inter and Milan, and never hid that he was most beautiful among the Rosoners and that he wanted to return one day and live with his family again in Milan. He also did not hide that he reluctantly left the club in 2010 when he was bundled with Tiago Silva to sell to Paris Saint-Germain because Milan needed the money and that Galliano then practically forced them to transfer.
In two seasons in Milan, Ibrahimovic scored 56 goals in 85 games and was most credited with the Rosoners' last Serie A title in 2011. Since then, the glorious fall of the famous club from San Siro has continued ...
Interesting clubs for Ibrahimovic this fall were Bologna, Napoli, Boka Juniors, Flamengo ... But Milan seemed to be the most attractive option for the famous Swede.
If you believe the news from America. By the way, Gazidis, who has been opposed to bringing Ibrahimovic to work in the MLS League for 14 years, knows Garber well, so he might need to look for the source of information released by the first MLS League man tonight.
(PHOTO: reuters)
